comment: There exists a unique decomposition of a prime as a sum of squares of two different positive integers iff the prime is of the form ` 4 k + 1 ` . (Contributed by AV, 11-Jun-2023.) The prime needs not be odd, as observed by WL. (Revised by AV, 25-Jun-2023.)
